name: TouchableOpacity
description: A wrapper for TouchableOpacity component. Support onPress, throttling and activeBackgroundColor

props.name: throttleTime
props.description: Throttle time in MS for onPress callback

props.name: activeBackgroundColor
props.description: Apply background color on TouchableOpacity when active (press is on)

props.name: useNative
props.description: Should use an enhanced native implementation with extra features

props.name: customValue
props.description: Custom value of any type to pass on to TouchableOpacity and receive back in onPress callback
